frames.name: run1
frames.description: galloping with front legs extended forward, mane flowing

frames.name: run2
frames.description: galloping with all legs tucked under body mid-stride

frames.name: run3
frames.description: galloping with back legs pushing off, dynamic pose

frames.name: run4
frames.description: galloping with legs fully stretched out, peak stride

frames.name: idle
frames.description: standing still in a relaxed pose, facing right

frames.name: jump
frames.description: leaping upward with front legs raised high

frames.name: hit
frames.description: stumbling backward with a startled expression, off balance
